title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 212/85 of 28 January 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1767/82 laying down detailed rules for applying specific import levies on certain milk products
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 212/85
of 28 January 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1767/82 laying down detailed rules for applying specific import levies on certain milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1767/82 is hereby amended as follows:
1. In the first indent of point (c), the text of letter (b), is replaced by the following:
'(b) 6 250 tonnes including the quota of Finlandia referred to in point (q) originating in Finland'.
2. In (b) of the second indent of point (c) '1 350 tonnes' is replaced by '1 600 tonnes'.
3. In (b) of point (h) '500 tonnes' is replaced by '550 tonnes'.
4. In point (s) 'for 1984' is deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 January 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 150, 6. 6. 1984, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 329, 24. 12. 1979, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 341, 29. 12. 1984, p. 8.
(5) OJ No L 196, 5. 7. 1982, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 313, 1. 12. 1984, p. 45.
